expect.help: The maximum number of results to be worked with during one execution cycle. Maximum `50` records.
expect.name: limit
expect.label: Limit

SearchForContacts.expectJsonc:
[
	{
		"name": "query",
		"type": "text",
		"label": "Query",
		"required": true,
		"help": "Use [Segmentation Query Language](https://sendgrid.com/docs/for-developers/sending-email/segmentation-query-language/). For example: `email LIKE '%gmail.com'`."
	},
	{
		"help": "The maximum number of results to be worked with during one execution cycle. Maximum `50` records.",
		"name": "limit",
		"type": "uinteger",
		"label": "Limit",
		"default": 2,
		"required": true
	}
]
